Simple the best Counter-Strike to this day. The movement is so fluent which makes the game more enjoyable to play and the guns are pretty balanced but take some time to get good with.  Comparing it to CSGO, Source will win everytime for me. The community is a lot more mature and fun to play with. The game does have its negatives such as not a lot of people are playing it, but if you are tired of all the hackers/smurfs in CSGO competitive and all the immature people that make up 90% of the playerbase, then Source is the game for you.

Pros:
+Your shots will actually register
+Less cheaters
+Less 10 year olds
+Less tryhard highschool dropouts
+Less racist banter over the mic
+Less mic chatter in general
+No competitive rank e-peens for people to brag about
+The Deagle is useful, and not a $700 parlor trick
+No Canals
+No in-game skins, and as a result, no gambling
+You can spray a decal (for free!) without it being limited and absolute garbage
+Community DM servers aren't all FFA, so you can actually spawn
+Arctic Avengers playermodels
+No cringy Anarchist/FBI voice acting
+Corpse ragdolls don't lose all physical attributes when they hit the ground
+The option to attach a silencer to the M4 doesn't require castrating the weapon
+No ADS scope on the AUG/SG to use as an excuse to berate people for using said weapons
+Has a flashlight
+You can kill the hostages
+Weapon sounds are slightly less awful
+Valve doesn't care about this game, so they won't arbitrarily fuck up the maps every 20 seconds

Cons:
-Quake sounds. Quake sounds everywhere
-FIRE IN THE HOLE FIRE IN THE HOLE FIRE IN THE HOLE FIRE IN THE HOLE FIRE IN THE HOLE
-The cheaters you do encounter probably won't get banned because that would require Valve to actually do something
-Only maps people will play are Dust2 and Office
-Glock is somehow even worse
-No sexy Basque accents
-Majority of the remaIning playerbase is comprised of middle-aged truck drivers
I saw the price tag of $19.99 and said "why not"
interesting game cheap and wierd mechanics but so many players make it better. Just curious why so many manipulators are playing guess must be good enough.

Ah, Counter-Strike Source. This game was my first [i] real[/i] touch to PC FPS gaming. I had played some CoD on my friends Playstation before, but nothing too serious. I've liked this game from the moment I begun playing it, and it is the very reason I begun playing CS:GO and a bunch of other FPS games back in the day, like TF2.
Nowadays I feel clumsy playing the game, as I've put so many hours to CS:GO. The mechanics of this game feel so much less detailed, that I always have to readjust to it. However, that's no biggie, as this game is a whole lot more casual.
This game isn't about top notch competitive gameplay, this is about gamers that have their own small communities and servers they play on. I love the finnish CS:S community, a lot of good times spent on so called sauna servers.
Now if you start to wonder how all this could've happened in so little playtime, it's because I've played this game more on a different account, which was at my friends house.
I recommend this game to anyone who isn't too concernced about bad graphics, but then again, CS has never been all about the graphics. This game is perfect for having a bit of casual fun.
Overall, a solid 8/10.

(I have played this game more on a different account.)

其实css和csgo相比，无论是从制作商还是从游戏本身来看，css作为cs正统续作是比go纯正的。
首先csgo是valve外包ip，所以说属于创意输出然后再自己接管的意思叭。但是css是valve自家做出来的。
然后是画面，不得不说css毕竟也是04年的游戏了(我记不太清了，反正比go早)，但是我认为css的画面质量在当时绝对是相当的高，就算放到2018，css的画面也不算差，可玩性也是依旧(这可是CS,耐玩性是很强的) 
csgo是12年的游戏了，作为v社到现在为止最重视的一款cs，画面绝对是最强，而且也准备要换起源2引擎了(魔兽已经换了为什么go还不换呢)
但是....
对，我要说但是了。
csgo的画面是很好，可是整体的风格并没有继承cs之前的作品。
dust2来说，风格有很大的差异，甚至可以作为另一款使用cs游戏规则的游戏来看，也许是策划认为玩家不喜欢这沙漠地图了叭，css不同，css完美继承了历代cs的地图特点，而且增加了一些新的元素，虽然感觉很复古，但是其实对于一些老玩家来说这也是美好的回忆。
再从游戏上来说，css和csgo的经典竞技都是差不多的机制，所以不再多说。枪械上，css基本上保留了cs前作武器的特点，go则是加以修改 给老武器新的地位，或者其他处置方法。你会发现csgo中大部分枪的音效属性都变了。在起源中则不很明显。
个人觉得csgo更像是新酒装老瓶，从已经被玩家们玩了多年的cs中寻求新的创意，css则是固守派，在几乎保持不变的玩法中慢慢改进玩家的体验。
csgo更适合现在的大部分玩家，css适合真正有情怀的老玩家，要知道go的dust2是无法唤醒老玩家的回忆的。
css卖的这么贵，是因为css面向的是核心玩家，是真的热爱cs的玩家，当然我知道把不同时间上的游戏相比确实有些牵强，但是我想css的销量大概没有多大的浮动。所以我有信心说出来。
两款游戏都是好游戏，可惜了。
一款被外挂摧残，一款在慢慢消亡。
CS这个经典之作能否在浪涛中再次崛起，就要看玩家和市场的考验了。
以上。

10/10 would deagle again

I have played all of the Counter-Strike games and this is the one I have the most playetime in. I had this game before I even had a Steam account and I have probably played about 4000 hours of it. The bots are very well coded and the AI was some of the best for the time. It also has some of my favourite maps that didn't make it into Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, including de_port and de_chateau. I also love ahving the MP5 which I'm upset that they didn't bring it to CS:GO (at least in the actually release). This was my go to game every day untill I bought CS:GO. Always happy to play it.

Would recommend to anyone.
